params.smagicinteract__SMSText__c:
Hi {{114__FirstName}}, use the following link to cancel your Cardtapp mobile app subscription: http://bit.ly/2s5ojDa 

You MUST complete this process for your subscription to be cancelled in our system.

params.comment:
Hello from Cardtapp,

We've identified your most recent support request as possibly being a request for cancellation. To assist you, our system has sent a  text message with a cancellation link to your mobile number  {{114__MobilePhone}}. This is necessary to confirm your account and is the fastest and easiest way to cancel your subscription.

Simply click on the link in that text message and you can complete the cancellation process in less than a minute.

If you don't receive the text message within 5 minutes, simply text the word CANCEL to 38470 and the link will be re-sent to your phone.

Note: You MUST complete the ENTIRE online cancellation process in order for your subscription to be cancelled. 

If you did not intend to cancel, you may simply ignore this message.

An indivdual cancellation has been processed by the Pardot -> SF automation for:

Name: {{146__memberFirstname}} {{146__memberLastName}}

IMPORTANT:  This member could not be matched to a Salesforce record, probably because the email is different. As a result, no automated actions have been taken in the contact record.

An indivdual cancellation has been processed by the Pardot -> SF automation for:

Email: {{149__memberEmail}}

IMPORTANT:  This member could not be matched to a Salesforce record, possibly because the email is different. As a result, no automated actions have been taken in the contact record. 

First step:
-- Find the correct contact record in SF

What needs to be done in Stripe:
- Delete the member's existing plan in Stripe
- Add the "Monthly No Sharing Plan - $19/mo" 
- If switching from an annual or quarterly, trial out the plan until the member's renewal date

What needs to be done in ZD:
- Add public comment to member confirming that they are now on the $4/mo plan, and informing them that they won't be eligible to share their app.
- Close ticket

What needs to be done in SF:
- Turn off all features

What needs to be done in App Admin:
- Reset EasyText keyword to generic pattern (subdomain + 3 numbers) if required

params.name: {{174__FirstName__c}} {{174__LastName__c}}
params.first_comment:
A self-service signup form has been submitted via Formstack, and a Stripe subscription has been created for this customer.

Customer name: {{174__FirstName__c}} {{174__LastName__c}}
Customer email: {{174__Email__c}}
Billing state: {{174__State__c}}
Stripe token: {{171__data__object__id}}
Plan: {{174__Subscription_Type__c}}
Quantity:  {{174__Quantity__c}}

Campaign:  {{174__Campaign__c}}

Todo:
----------
Stripe Record:
(1) Open stripe record and add the correct state within the description.
(2) If the billing state is WA, change the subscription plan to include 10% sales tax.
(2a)If the billing state is WA AND the initial charge has already occurred, run an additional manual charge for 10% of the base charge amount.

Contact Record:
(1) Look up the customer email+cell from SSU form in SF contacts. If a record exists, great! If not, create a new contact record.
(2) Refer to campaign creation form to update record appropriately -
ie. Branch/DBA, contact owner, lead source, etc.
(3) If the subscription type includes premium features, add a subscription add-on child record to the contact record. (Reference campaign creation form to confirm)
(4) Attach the self signup record to the Contact record.
(5) - If the subscription involves a trial, enter the Stripe trial end date into the Contact Record Paid Subscription Start Date field

App Creation (if no app pre-provisioned):
((NOTE: If app exists already, skip to #3 here and then final steps below))  
(1) Check that product name is accurate given the vertical you are provisioning on.
(2) Provision the app with the appropriate template & subdomain. 
(Reference campaign creation form for correct vertical, preferred subdomain & template)
(3) Apply preferred keyword if applicable.
(4) Turn on correct features

Final Steps:
(1) Add the stripe token above in App Admin.
(2) Confirm paid subscription start date is populated/accurate.
(3) Reference campaign creation form for preferred follow up.

Useful links:
------------------
SF self signup record: https://login.salesforce.com/{{175__Id}}
Stripe customer record: https://dashboard.stripe.com/customers/{{171__data__object__id}}
Self-signup campaign creation:  https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1SPYi2xDfcNRLSlD3Tm-WzyKRnw1SpjsJU8Ge9h5VOec/
